Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) can be made to last longer and perform better if their operating temperatures are lowered.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Traditional SOFCs, however, have poor performance at low temperatures due to significant Ohmic and polarization losses.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Regarding ionic conductivity, doped ceria excels as a low-temperature SOFC catalyst.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, Bi-doped CeO2 (Bi0.1Ce0.9O2) has been used to function as an electrolyte in low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Bi-CeO2 is prepared as a functional electrolyte layer placed between two symmetrical porous electrodes NCAL (Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-delta) by a wet chemical coprecipitation process.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Using Na2Co3 as a precipitating agent enhances the performance of the produced Bi-CeO2 particles by enhancing their surface characteristics.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The synthesized Bi-CeO2 electrolyte demonstrates an impressive fuel cell performance with a high ionic conductivity of 0.192 S/cm at a low temperature of 520 degrees C. Additionally, Bi-doped CeO2 demonstrates remarkable proton performance, with 660 mW/cm(2) and an activation energy of only 0.456 eV at 520 degrees C.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The mechanism of high conduction was proposed in great detail.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The findings demonstrate that high ionic and proton conductivity in fuel cells is possible at low temperatures.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, the suggested work hints at the possibility of designing well-functioning electrolytes for advancing low-temperature fuel-cell technology.
Titulo: Designing Proton Conducting Electrolytes for Low-Temperature Ceramic Fuel Cells
